document_data.mainbody:
Mercatio was a minor merchant organization and a noble family from the city of Arrabar in the Vilhon Reach.
In the late 14 century DR, Adyan Mercatio was the scion of House Mercatio. By the , Adyan Mercatio was the member of the Waukeenar mercenary organization â€“ the Order of the Sapphire Crescent, seving alongside two fellow noble scions, Vambran Matrell of House Matrell and Horial Rohden of House Rohden
